key_risks: Economic sensitivity to construction and infrastructure spending
controversies: Antitrust investigations, such as the 2018 case involving the acquisition of Texas Industries
Local community resistance to new quarry developments
environmental_issues: Habitat disruption, water usage, and emissions from quarrying and mining operations
social_issues: Efforts to support local communities through material donations and partnerships
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance challenges and potential delays in acquisitions due to legal scrutiny
